item.title: Convert Seurat to Scanpy h5ad
item.author: Author
item.description: IMPORTANT UPDDATE: 2023-02-21 Best Refer to MuDataSeurat 1 2 3 4 5 # single modality MuDataSeurat::WriteH5AD(srt, "srt.h5ad") # multi modality MuDataSeurat::WriteH5MU(srt, "srt.h5mu") ReadH5AD(): Read an .h5mu file and create a Seurat object. ReadH5MU(): Create a Seurat object from .h5mu file contents WriteH5AD(): Write one assay to .
